programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: An aggressive Manchester Terrier; a Wheaton Terrier with poor social skills; a dog who is afraid of the ocean.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Nate Brouwer and Charnae Wright bonded through their love of dogs and the outdoors, but their feuding dogs are threatening to tear them apart.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A dog trained to sniff out contraband cell phones in prisons is unable to do his job due to his skittish nature; a dog is terrified of hot air balloons.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A dogo Argentino with canine aggression; a terrier/corgi mix who becomes aggressive when faced with traveling.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Aggressive bulldog Hugo is sent to canine rehab; Crusty must overcome his dominance issues if he's ever going to enjoy walks.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Two Jack Russell terriers, Ruby and Jinx, show how dogs communicate through energy and body language.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Stella is a bulldog mascot for a dog-friendly cafe; a German shepherd who barks to loud, and two aggressive miniature pinschers.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: At an army base, Cesar helps an Australian shepherd scared of men in uniform and a Shetland shepherd who barks non-stop when planes fly overhead.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps two former gang members through Homeboy Industries, an outreach program designed to break the cycle of gang violence but who have problem dogs at home.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps Melody and Tom, who is so terrified of dogs that he will even leave a job site if one is near, deal with their fears and anxieties.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps a newlywed couple whose dogs don't let them get close and another pair who met online and are nervous about introducing their dogs.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A Pointer mix is fixated on pinecones, while an Australian shepherd whines every time his owner switches on the vacuum cleaner.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Young fans Jessica and Rachel join Cesar as he deals with a tiny dog with an outsized personality and a nervous pit bull mix afraid of the sea.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar helps owners of rescue dogs including a terrier mix that screams and a Belgian Tervuren scared of her own home; Cesar helps a family adopting their first dog.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Cesar travels to the U.K. to help troubled dog owners with a territorial street dog and a dalmatian whose personality can turn ugly.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: British problem dogs including wild German Shepherds, a dog that must be muzzled by court order, and an English cocker spaniel that hates cars.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: Mufasa, a South African boerboel, became aggressive after being pinned down by another dog; Tucker, a teacup poodle, behavior becomes more aggressive.

programme.title: Dog Whisperer
programme.desc: A couple with three unruly dogs, one with aggression issues; a poodle who fears the back door since running into the screen door; a Weimaraner who is territorial and aggressive.

programme.desc: A dog with an abusive past fears men; a Border Collie mix refuses to leave his chair and is afraid of leashes.
